TopicTitle: On the nth day of Christmas, Jebediah gave to me...

Articles.Content:
What is this?

This is a game where forum users work together to create an outrageously long variation of the popular song "The Twelve Days of Christmas".

End goal

The last post of this game should contain an entire community-made song for all to enjoy.

Rules and guidelines:

-Each new reply adds the next highest day to the song (1st day, then 2nd, then 3rd, and so on)

-Each added lyric should generally follow the rhythm of the original song (an entire Wikipedia article is a good example of what not to do)

-No lyric has to relate to Christmas or any other user-created lyric. Be as creative as you want!

-There is no limit to how many days can be in the song

-Profanity, racial slurs, insults, and other inappropriate language and behavior IS NOT permitted. All official KSP community restrictions apply. 

An example of how this might look:

Wpetula: on the 1st day of Christmas Jebediah gave to me...

...a rocket made out of pear trees.

JadeOfMaar: on the 2nd day of Christmas Jebediah gave to me...

...two broken spaceplanes,

and a rocket made out of pear trees.

Gameslinx: on the 3rd day of Christmas Jebediah gave to me...

...three modders modding,

two broken spaceplanes,

and a rocket made out of pear trees.

(ETC.)

I'll start:

On the first day of Christmas Jebediah gave to me, a rocket made out of pear trees.

Edited December 22, 2022 by wpetula
Clarified rules

On the  second day of Christmas Jedidiah gave to me, two kraken doves, and a rocket made of pear trees.

(Could not think of anything better )

Edited December 21, 2022 by Sky Kerman
On the third day of Christmas Jebediah gave to me 3 modded installs of KSP, two kraken doves, and a rocket made of pear trees.

Moved to the Forum Games sub.

Be advised, even if the rules of the game say something, they cannot break the Forum Guidelines. 

Mild profanity is not allowed.   OP has been edited to reflect this.

On the fourth day of Christmas Jebediah gave to me 4 mammoth engines, 3 modded installs of KSP, two kraken doves, and a rocket made of pear trees.

On the 9th day of Christmas, like the entire week before, Jebediah Kermann keeps working because he hates the idleness.

On the 14th day of Christmas Jebediah knelt up from the carpet, walked on his four to the table, swallowed some brine from the jar of pickles, and felt a little better.
He tried to remember what weekday is today, but gave up, and just drank the remains of mineral water from the bottle.
